name: Jendo: Origins
description:
Story
The beginning of Jack’s and his friends’ adventures.

After parents’ divorce, Jack and his father move to a small provincial town in the south of the country. Anticipating a chance to start new school life with good friends and pretty girls, he gets into serious troubles at the very first day and completely loses any hope for that. But the acquaintance with a seemingly ordinarily-looking guy changes his life forever.



Lots of funny and non-standard situations, romance and drama, humor and even thriller – all this awaits you in our visual novel.

Key features of the game


  • over seven hours of content;
  • pleasant musical accompaniment;
  • 50+ arts;
  • dynamic and compelling story;
  • 12 unique characters;
  • sparkling humor;
  • and much more!
